description:
The last test of the Divine Visionary Candidate Exam is a one-on-one battle. The first match pits Mash against Margarette. Mash faces off against Macaron, a magic user said to have great magic power and is treated on the same level as a Divine Visionary. How and where will this tough fight end?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mash Burnedead and the Magical Maestro
Mash Burnedead et le sorcier virtuose
Mash Burnedead to Oto no Mahou Tsukai
マッシュ・バーンデッドと音の魔法使い
